subSections.title: Readings
Etymology
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|とひと}}
Originally a compound of {{compound|ja|sort=とひと|外|tr1=to|t1=outside|人|tr2=hito|t2=person}}. The kanji used is an example of [[熟字訓|jukujikun]].

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|とひと}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=とひと|archaic|pejorative}} a [[countrified]] or [[rustic]] person: a [[hick]], a [[bumpkin]]
